# Northern Ontario Passive Autonomous Monitoring

## Request for Proposal
[Details about RFP from Environment and Climate Change Canada Procurement & Contracting Division][1]

### Contract Requirements
The Government of Canada is seeking proposals for a contract to provide baseline information for boreal caribou and other mammals in the Far North Range. The successful contractor will be required to deploy and retrieve remote recorders in Ontario's Far North to allow data collection on caribou and caribou predators for the evaluation of predation risk for boreal caribou in Northern Ontario.

### Basis of Selection
The selection of the successful contractor will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%).

### Contract Period
The contract period will be from the contract award date to March 31, 2025, inclusive. The resulting contract will include an irrevocable option to extend the contract term by up to two (2) additional one (1) year periods.
